translations.New data was add via API to report {repo: API-n keresztül új adat lett hozzáadva a {report} riporthoz
translations.New data was add via dataload to report: Adatbetöltés által új adatok kerültek a  {report} riportba
translations.Monitor GitHub downloads in realtime: Figyelje a GitHub letöltéseit valós időben
translations.Last field must be a valid number: Az utolsó mezőnek érvényes számnak kell lennie
translations.Thresholds can trigger notifications and: A küszöbértékek értesítéseket és színváltozásokat hoznak létre a riportokban
translations.Read file and add its data to an existin: Olvassa be az adatokat, és adja hozzá a tartalmat egy meglévő riporthoz
translations.Title: Cím
translations.Name: Név
translations.This section is used for advanced report: Ez a szakasz a speciális jelentés- és adatadat -konfigurációkhoz használható.
translations.Report was changed - Press here to save: A riport megváltozott - Kattintson ide a mentéshez
translations.Ignore leading rows: Figyelmen kívül hagyja a vezető sorokat
translations.Text variables can be used in the name o: Text variables can be used in the name or subheader. They are replaced when the report is executed.
translations.Reports can be grouped into a folder str: Reports can be grouped into a folder structure
translations.Reports can read their data either from: Reports can read their data either from realtime data sources or from saved datasets within the Nextcloud database.
translations.Different data sources are available. Th: Different data sources are available. The data is read in realtime when the report is being executed.
translations.Every datasource requires specific param: Every datasource requires specific parameter. Please enter the information.
translations.The report can be based on a new dataset: The report can be based on a new dataset or read existing data that is available already.
translations.Many reports can be based on the same da: Many reports can be based on the same data, but every report has its own visualization, threshold and sharing settings.
translations.Datasets can store data from scheduled d: Datasets can store data from scheduled data loads, the REST API or manual data entry. This can be configured via the Dataset maintenance
translations.Choose the names of the columns for the: Choose the names of the columns for the new dataset
translations.All settings can be changed afterwards: All settings can be changed afterwards
translations.The report can now be created: The report can now be created
